Process an algorithm described in an xml element with a matching "description = ..." attribute.

algorithmName to receive the name of the algorithm instance

template<typename T>
StatusCode pandora::XmlHelper::Read2DVectorOfValues ( const TiXmlHandle &  xmlHandle,
const std::string &  xmlElementName,
const std::string &  rowName,
std::vector< std::vector< T > > &  vector 
) [inline, static]

Read a two-dimensional array of values into a vector of vectors.

Each row of values must be contained within <rowname></rowname> xml tags, whilst the values in the row must be space separated

Parameters:
xmlHandle the relevant xml handle
xmlElementName the name of the xml element to examine
rowName the row name
vector to receive the 2d vector of values
